= location( arg1, ..., argN ) =

Allows for customising a rule so it only works for a specific location.  Checks if any of the supplied arguments match the location an item is in.

== Arguments ==

  * arg1...N = location

== Alias ==

  * loc()

== Remarks ==

  * matched on lower case for string values

  * Bag = `bag`, or localised string
  * Keyring = `keyring`, `key`, or localised string
  * Bank = `bank`, or localised string
  * Guild Bank = `guild bank`, `vault`, or localised string
  * Mail = `mail`, or localised string
  * Wearing = `wearing`, `gear`, or localised string
  * Pet = `pet`, `mount`, or localised string
  * Token = `token`, or localised string

== Examples ==

`loc( bag )`

`loc( gear )`

`loc( sac )`  (french)
